{{Wireless embedded system |brand=Huawei |model=AP6050DN |revision=Ver.A |fcc_date=07/24/2018 |manuf_country=China |is_manuf=No |availability=now |type=access point |fcc_id=QISAP6050DN |pcb_id=18K-00001-21 |pwr_v=12 |pwr_amp=2 |pwr_conn=barrel |pwr_poe=at |cpu1_brand=Qualcomm |cpu1_model=IPQ8068 |cpu1_cspeed=1.4 GHz |cpu1_cores=2 |fla1=128 |fla1_brand=Macronix |fla1_model=NAND MX30UF1G18AC |fla2=4 |fla2_brand=Macronix |fla2_model=SPI MX25L3233F |ram1=256 |ram1_brand=Nanya |ram1_model=NT5CC64M16GP-DI |ram1_num=2 |expansion_if_types=USB 2.0 |expansion_minipcie_num=1 |expansion_usb_num=1 |serial=yes,, console,, RJ45,, X15 |wi1_chip1_brand=Qualcomm Atheros |wi1_chip1_model=QCA9984 |wi1_802dot11_protocols=an+ac |wi1_ant_conn=U.FL |wi1_txchains=4 |wi1_rxchains=4 |wi1_sstreams=4 |wi2_chip1_brand=Qualcomm Atheros |wi2_chip1_model=QCA9984 |wi2_802dot11_protocols=bgn |wi2_ant_conn=U.FL |wi2_txchains=4 |wi2_rxchains=4 |wi2_sstreams=4 |eth_cpu=true |eth_chip2_brand=Broadcom |eth_chip2_model=B50612E;B50612EB1KMLG; |eth_chip3_brand=Broadcom |eth_chip3_model=B50612E;B50612EB1KMLG; |lan_speed=1G |lan_ports=2 |addl_chips=True 3.0V to 5.5V RS-232 Transceivers;Exar;SP3232E;;1; ,,, 16-Bit Dual-Supply Bus Transceiver;TI;SN74AVC16T245;;1; ,,, Wide Input Voltage Range 150mA ULDO Regulator;Diodes Incorporated;AP2204;;1;;ADJG1; ,,, IEEE 802.3at High Efficiency PoE Interface and DC-DC Controller;TI;TPS23754;;1; ,,, Temperature Sensor With I 2 C and SMBus Interface in Industry Standard LM75 Form Factor and Pinout;TI;TMP75;;1; ,,, Low-Voltage 16-Bit I2C and SMBus I/O Expander with Interrupt Output and Configuration Registers;TI;TCA9555;;1;;PW555; |flags=Wave2, MU-MIMO, 256QAM, Link Aggregation, DFS (master), 802.11k, 802.11v, 802.11r, |stock_boot=U-Boot;385 (Aug-07-2016 - 16:00:52) |stock_os=Linux;3.10.62;-ltsi-WR6.0.0.21_standard; |802dot11_protocols=abgn+ac |default_user=admin |default_pass=admin@huawei.com |oui=D0:54:2D |oui_eth=D0:54:2D }}
:• '''1733''' Mbps - 4SS 5GHz [https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/IEEE_802.11ac#Data_rates_and_speed 802.11ac] (80MHz chan.), :• '''800''' Mbps - 4SS 2.4GHz [https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/IEEE_802.11n-2009#Data_rates 802.11n] (40MHz chan., 256QAM) = '''''2600 Mbps'' class'''
{{TagLine|802.11ac Wireless LAN Access Point}} :{{ProductPage|http://e.huawei.com/en/products/enterprise-networking/wlan/indoor-access-points/ap6050dn-ap6150dn}} {{WiFiCert|WFA78374|07/04/2018}} "H86D2TQ1D502 VER:A" is silkscreened on the board in the FCC photos. Internal photos are not detailed enough to identify most chips so many details are assumed to be very similar to the first [[Huawei AP6050DN]]. This new version has four separate FEMs for both 2.4 GHz and 5 GHz radios whereas the earlier version only had two FEMs for each radio which each handled two spatial streams. *[[Huawei AP6050DN]] - ''802.11ac Wi-Fi AP'' :CPU: [[Qualcomm]] IPQ8068 1.4GHz Dual Core :WLAN: 2x [[Qualcomm Atheros]] QCA9984 4T4R :LAN: 2x [[Broadcom]] B50612EB1KMLG PHY ===Specifications=== [http://e.huawei.com/en/related-page/products/enterprise-network/wlan/indoor-access-points/ap6050dn-ap6150dn/brochure/wlan-ap6050dn-ap6150dn Specifications on '''Huawei'''] *MIMO: Spatial Streams: 4x4:4 (SU-MIMO), 4x4:3 (MU-MIMO) *AP6050DN: Antenna: Gain: 2.4GHz: 6dBi, 5GHz: 6dBi :Type: 4x Built-in omni-directional dual-band antenna *Power rating: DC 12V/2A or PoE 48V/0.6A (802.3at) ==Images== File:Huawei_AP6050DN_Top.jpg|Top File:Huawei_AP6050DN_Bottom.jpg|Bottom File:Huawei_AP6050DN_Connectors.jpg|Connectors [[Has images::external| ]] File:Huawei_AP6050DN_Case_Open.jpg|Case Open File:Huawei_AP6050DN_Antenna.jpg|Antenna File:Huawei_AP6050DN_PCB_Top.jpg|PCB Top File:Huawei_AP6050DN_PCB_Bottom.jpg|PCB Bottom File:Huawei_AP6050DN_IPQ8068_SoC.jpg|Qualcomm IPQ8068 SoC File:Huawei_AP6050DN_B50612E_PHYs.jpg|Broadcom B50612EB1KMLG PHYs File:Huawei_AP6050DN_MX30UF1G18AC_NAND_Flash.jpg|Macronix MX30UF1G18AC-IT NAND Flash File:Huawei_AP6050DN_Wi-Fi_1.jpg|Qualcomm QCA9984 Wi-Fi 1 File:Huawei_AP6050DN_Wi-Fi_2.jpg|Qualcomm QCA9984 Wi-Fi 2 File:Huawei_AP6050DN_Power_Supply.jpg|Power Supply File:Huawei_AP6050DN_MX25L3233F_SPI_Flash.jpg|Macronix MX25L3233F SPI Flash [[Has images::internal| ]] __NOTOC__
